thread.title: Lover gets arrested for decorating car with Rs2,000 notes
thread.title_full: Lover gets arrested for decorating car with Rs2,000 notes

title: Lover gets arrested for decorating car with Rs2,000 notes
text: Man decorates car wit Rs2,000 notes on V-Day, arrested Web Report   | Last updated on February 14, 2017 at 02.05 pm Share Vote He was detained by the Mumbai police along with his car The lover certainly went a notch higher to prove his love for his girlfriend on Valentine's Day. Instead of getting pampered by his girlfriend in return, his gesture got him arrested. To please his lady love, a Mumbai-based man went on to decorate his car with Rs2,000 notes. But as soon as he got the vehicle on the road, he was detained by the Mumbai police along with his car. If reports are to be believed, the guy wanted to gift the car decorated with notes to his girlfriend on Valentine's Day. The identity of the person has been held back by the police.
